class.name: RenderDataExtension
class.brief_description: This class allows for a RenderData implementation to be made in GDExtension.
class.description: This class allows for a RenderData implementation to be made in GDExtension.

method.name: _get_camera_attributes
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the [RID] for the implementations camera attributes object.

method.name: _get_render_scene_buffers
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the [RID] of the implementations environment object.

method.name: _get_render_scene_data
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the implementations [RenderSceneDataExtension] object.
